description: This documents the template file format. For an actual template
file this 'description' array provides descriptive information about
the template that will be displayed when a user asks for template information.
The 'cfsapp-' and 'comsos-' name/value pairs define the directories and template
files that will be instantiated by the OpenSat CreateApp tool. Each name defines
a relative directory path. Normally these paths are relative to <osk>/cfs/apps and
allows the user to change the defaults. The portion of the name string after the
prefix hyphon specifies the relative target directory path.
Files within a directory that a user wants instantiated are listed in a
comma separated string. Explicitied stating which files get instantiated
allows additonal unprocessed files to be in the template directory.
